attributes.action: Make sure that the workers involved in the Wildcat Strikes at the Royal Mail are dismissed from work all together and to refund any financial losses suffered during these illegal strikes are reimbursed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The wildcat strikes are illegal and not supported by the CWU. These people are affecting the lives of innocent people who pay for a service they are not getting. It is disgusting that these workers feel hard done by for being asked to work for 8 hours that they are paid for. They should be sacked immediately and replaced by eastern european workers who would appreciate the work they do.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
